## KUMOStakeChange type

Represents the change between two states of an KUMO Stake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type KUMOStakeChange<T> = {
    stakeKUMO: T;
    unstakeKUMO?: undefined;
} | {
    stakeKUMO?: undefined;
    unstakeKUMO: T;
    unstakeAllKUMO: boolean;
};
```
